channel.title: Players Can't see other Players sometimes (Iclarity)
channel.description:
Hello there. I've recently came across a bug during testing in my server and it appears (usually when someone uses a portal teleport) some players cannot see other players unless they log out and log back in. This can become annoying in PVP as a player will appear to be attacked by what looks like nothing. Giving them an advantage, does anyone know how to go about fixing this bug? some assistance would be greatly appreciated.
- Thankyou

item.title: Players Can't see other Players sometimes (Iclarity)

@sly_theft wrote:

Still can’t find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Players Can't see other Players sometimes (Iclarity)

item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

There’s a fix for this, it was something to do with under the actiobutton Id. Use the search button.

item.title: Players Can't see other Players sometimes (Iclarity)
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

sounds like the people who can’t see said ‘inadvisables’ didn’t receive the proper player bitmap for their region.

item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

Unicron:

like zosedan said. the cache, or otherwise the player-handling script are to blame.

Is there anyway to fix this problem?
